name: Cat Foster Carer Application
description: Note: Foster Carer positions are currently only available to Victorian residents.
footer: By submitting this form, you agree that the cat will remain the property of Homeless Hounds and that you will remain in contact with us throughout the duration of fostering. Please be aware that adoption fees will apply if you want to adopt as agreed at the beginning of the Fostering Period.

fields.label: Your Local Council (VIC only)

fields.name: q13
fields.label: 1. Do you have any kids living at home?

fields.name: q14
fields.label: 2. If yes, how old are they and have they lived with a cat before?

fields.name: do_you_currently_have_any_pets_if_so_wha
fields.label: Do you currently have any pets? If so, what kind? Breed, age, gender, desexed? Up to date with parasite control and vaccinations?

fields.name: do_you_have_any_experience_with_pets_and
fields.label: Do you have any experience with pets and/or fostering animals? If yes or no, please explain and elaborate.

fields.name: when_fostering_a_cat_are_you_able_to_tra
fields.label: When fostering a cat, are you able to transport it to a Homeless Hounds vet?

fields.name: are_you_able_to_keep_your_foster_cat_ind
fields.label: Are you able to keep your foster cat indoors or in a suitable cat enclosure during the day?

fields.name: if_you_have_any_other_pets_are_the_socia
fields.label: If you have any other pets are the social with other animals? If not please specify (e.g. does not like male cats). If you have a dog, is he…

fields.name: are_you_happy_to_talk_to_potential_adopt
fields.label: Are you happy to talk to potential adopters over the phone about your foster cat/s personality, and assuming suitability, facilitate them me…

fields.name: are_you_or_is_anyone_in_your_house_aller
fields.label: Are you or is anyone in your house allergic to cats?

fields.name: do_you_agree_that_we_need_ample_amount_o
fields.label: Do you agree that we need ample amount of time in regards to notice of you going away for a holiday and/or needing the cat to be moved?

fields.name: are_you_willing_to_commit_to_foster_the_
fields.label: Are you willing to commit to foster the cat for the term that he/she requires to be in care?

fields.name: would_you_be_interested_in_fostering_wit
fields.label: Would you be interested in fostering with a view to adoption possibly suitable dogs/cats?

fields.name: would_you_like_to_receive_news_and_updat
fields.label: Would you like to receive News and Updates from Homeless Hounds? You can opt-out at any time.
